articles.author: Sakina Fatima
articles.title: Australia announces first day of Eid Al-Fitr - The Siasat Daily
articles.description: Australian Fatwa Council announced that Friday, April 21, will be the last day of Ramzan and Saturday will be the first day of Eid Al-Fitr
articles.content:
The Australian Fatwa Council has announced that Friday, April 21, will be the last day of Ramzan and Saturday will be the first day of Eid Al-Fitr and the start of the month of Shawwal 1444/2023.
